original_title: NPP tops postal votes in H’tota District
original_body_lines: The National People’s Power (NPP) has obtained the highest number of postal votes in the Hambantota District in the 2024 General Election.
Accordingly, the NPP has polled 17,326 postal votes, while the Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) came second with 1,623 postal votes.
